head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GILBERT, RONALD ROY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GILBERT, RONALD ROY

block.p: GILBERT-Ronald Roy. Beloved husband of Bunny. Devoted father of Scott and Jeanni, Richard and Laura. Cherished Poppy of Janet, Eli, Jenny and Brigitte. Loving son of Mae and the late Sol. Dear brother of Barry. Funeral services Monday, 11 AM, ''Gutterman's Inc.'', 175 Long Beach Rd., Rockville Centre, LI.
